com.spring.aop.interfaces

Interface SecretServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecretService

    @Service
public interface SecretServiceInterface
    Author:
    Izhar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Secret readSecret(java.lang.String userId, java.util.UUID secretId)
      Read a secret by ID
      void shareSecret(java.lang.String userId, java.util.UUID secretId, java.lang.String targetUserId)

    • Method Detail

      • storeSecret

        java.util.UUID storeSecret(java.lang.String userId,
                           Secret secret)
        Store a secrete in the service. A new â€œsecretâ€? record is already created, identified by randomly generated UUID, with the current user as the owner of the secret.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the current user
        secret - the secret to be stored. No duplication or null check is performed.
        Returns:
        always return a new UUID for the given secret

      • readSecret

        Secret readSecret(java.lang.String userId,
                  java.util.UUID secretId)
        Read a secret by ID
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the current user
        secretId - the ID of the secret being requested
        Returns:
        the requested secret

      • shareSecret

        void shareSecret(java.lang.String userId,
                 java.util.UUID secretId,
                 java.lang.String targetUserId)
        Share a secret with another user. The secret may not have been created by the current user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the current user
        secretId - the ID of the secret being shared
        targetUserId - the ID of the user to share the secret with

      • unshareSecret

        void unshareSecret(java.lang.String userId,
                   java.util.UUID secretId,
                   java.lang.String targetUserId)
        Unshare the current user's own secret with another user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the current user
        secretId - the ID of the secret being unshared
        targetUserId - the ID of the user to unshare the secret with
